documents.document: My hair is dry within 2 hours of washing it and this is a concerning development. What's happening, hair?
@justonceplease I <3 middleaged emotionally stunted fuckboys who spend 1/2 a season trying to destroy a woman 😍😍😍
@justonceplease I like Diane and Lucca, but I was never watching for them
@justonceplease I'm gonna wait till trusted friends in the US have given me their feedback.
@justonceplease I tried, I really did, but I'm not convinced by what I've seen and heard of it.
When it comes to The Good Wife I have some VIEWS & I'll go to war over them. Miss me on that Will-Is-Perfect crap I swear to god
This was supposed to be a relaxing night but then I got into an internet fight about The Good Wife and arggggghhhh
It's been a fucking terrible day and, just to make things worse, I think I've hit my limit on carbs. They make me feel like crap now 😭😭😭😭😭😭😭
I've been saying this for years: you can tell a lot about a person by looking at the tweets they've liked https://t.co/VydTIipP3j

1) This is my kinda news 2) Hand cream is so important
(I know I'm a terrible person) https://t.co/IYNe0FOm0d
Side eyeing those who have a problem with the term "Muslim Ban", but seemed to have no problem the term "Öbamacare"
Here's the thread for the story behind this picture https://t.co/6qIfxFfZNf https://t.co/pT1TVYKOYZ
@Xenojay he was like "i know you're vegetarian, so I brought you a big salad". Like motherfucker, I ain't immune to that smell!!!
Friend came over to look after me at home. But he brought himself fried chicken so my place reeks of that while I eat scone, salad & soup 😢
Kinda wish I was at work for the announcement of the election date. But I'm currently sitting on my couch with ice cream, so nah. I'm good
SEPTEMBER 23!!! Gonna go right ahead and stick that day in my work calendar
I'll never understand why anyone wouldn't want to learn another language, let alone actively try to stop other people from doing so
Get out of my house, FFS!
All I wanna do is be in bed but there's builders outside my window & I'm about to fucking smash my way through it & destroy everything
@ezbear dammit!! I really can't eat until I get to work tomorrow. Next time tho (there will be a next time)
@CmmdrZed lol, amazing how often that offer gets made once people find out where I live hahaha
@ezbear holy heck! I've half a mind to catch an uber to Midnite right now for those nachos
@ezbear I don't get to eat until I get to work at 9.45am tomorrow. I regret everything. Arghhhhhhhhhhhhhh
@CmmdrZed easy stroll. I can see it from my lounge window - literally across the road and 1/2 a block over
I live 4 mins walk from a 24 hour McDonald's. I'm currently lying in bed going out of my mind cos I skipped dinner & fast food is so close!!
I swear to god if i see another white guy dab
Yay my fucking package went missing
MY NEW GOAL IN LIFE IS TO WRITE ONE OF THESE TWEETS https://t.co/zZ08IFEKLs
@beingahouse i've been there (watched every ep). I wish I could give you comfort, but no lol. My fave was Lemond Bishop's wardrobe hahaha
@beingahouse omg another person watching the good wife. And christ, Kalinda's wardrobe
@mchellekoiizumi I'm feeling very blessed to be living in NZ. But not really safe. At least, safer than if I was living in the US
@LuckyLamps ewww, Never would've occured to me (cos I don't like kids). Then again, I also don't move in those kind of circles so yeah
@LuckyLamps depends on the women. I can see the allure - ready made family, but you don't give birth & you can walk away, guilt-free
@ezbear @FuiFui_MoiMoi I always love when this happens. Read everything before it gets deleted!
But seriously, what the hell kinda woman believes a polynesian athlete when he says he's single? Come the fuck on!
If Twitter's taught women anything tonight, it's 1) Don't trust rich old white guys 2) Don't trust Polynesian athletes hahahaha
I guess when it comes down to it, this has mostly highlighted which of my friends won't have my back when shit gets real. Good to know

Today has shown which of my friends are against immigration & immigrants from brown countries.
Also, I'm an immigrant from a brown country
@ezbear I'm bringing ice cream to work tomorrow, my mind is made up (I won't be pouring alcohol on. But I WILL be thinking of it)
In these troubling political times, @FuiFui_MoiMoi reminds us what social media is best for - laughing at fuckboys https://t.co/ARBSSoPW6U
@gj_robins Best of luck!!!
@gj_robins 1) oooh!!! That's by my desk!!! 2) why are you at work?
I've been following world politics via twitter for 10 years now & the feeling of watching history being made is still very surreal
I remember a simpler time, when the ignorant nazi's & bigots on twitter didn't understand social media & weren't listened to
My neighbour is having a party & I'm desperate to know what spotify playlist he's using cos this music is fkn awesome
@ezbear we work better together than we do separately. I would bring ice cream on Monday, but it's prob more impt for us to get paid lol
Logging into my work email cos that's where I keep all the details of my hairdressing, eyebrow and facial appts. I'm a real adult now 😢😢😢
@ezbear on a happier (?!?!) note, I bought ice cream for my amarula today...which is at work. Ice cream fail!
@ezbear I think that goes for everyone who isn't them! They're the demographic I care the least about .
There's a lack of outrage at the recent development in the Emmett Till case on my TL & this is not surprising but still...ugh
This is the kind of commentary that I want on a Taylor Swift music video https://t.co/WCYmrfClK2
I want to sleep forever. But since I can't do that, I want to lie in bed with a hot water bottle, netflix and chocolate coconut milk.
@oharris69 I am fucking disgusted. I'm actually shaking right now. It makes me sick that this woman got to have a life
Whatever hopelessness & disgust I feel at what's happening in the world is magnified when I think about those who murdered #EmmettTill
That poor child was tortured & murdered because this woman lied. His murderers acquitted, later admitting to killing him #EmmettTill
Was grateful to not wake up to a new Trump announcement. Until I was sickened by Carolyn Bryant's overdue confession #EmmettTill
@Imane_Barlowen you are so so so welcome! It made my morning so much better!
The Nazi got punched again? Good times, good times https://t.co/KUOREZu2ID
Start building a wall, Canada! Look at your neighbours to the south, beef up your security https://t.co/92a73DyZU4
Everyday I have to remind myself that my anger is aimed towards the politicians & strategists who actively work towards this outcome
@steelbanks i honestly don't think it will. Hope to be proven wrong tho!
@steelbanks I think it started 5 years ago when Obama got elected and Trump started the birther movement.
@ezbear oh, I've already used that on my Christmas lunch! It was delicious too
@steelbanks oh, there's totally hope. I swear, one day there will be university papers & doctorates given on this time in history.
@ezbear oh gosh, you've just reminded me that I have a voucher to get a free lunch from them. And yes, it's delish. Had it before!
As shitty as I'm feeling about my life right now, at least I can take comfort in the fact that I'm not an American.
I"M TRYING TO WORK FROM HOME AND THIS GODDAMN SITE ISN'T WORKING WHAT THE FLYING FUCK WHY IS THIS STILL FUCKING HAPPENING ARGHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH
I don't really understand why rich politically conservative American's would want to move to NZ, especially now
@Xenojay oh yes!! That one!! I thought that was pretty obvious in the vid but I guess I was expecting too much
@Xenojay oh man, I hate doing this but I'm a little confused
@ezbear great hair tho
@ezbear I've sent my result to 3 friends & now they're annoyed cos I listened to a buzzfeed quiz, but not them lol https://t.co/yjhbjRO7Z1
YOU GUYS!!! THIS IS ACCURATE AF https://t.co/EvjrYeqWEh
I saw him again!! Today's song was Da Bomb by Inner Circle. This guy has the best music taste https://t.co/N6Qe8TRcAV
The more I talk to amazing Polynesians, the more I'm grateful for my upbringing & being raised by women who didn't take shit from anyone
You know what I find interesting? The difference in tweets between an account that has the users real name and/or job & one that doesn't.
@Xenojay I'm a think aloud kinda person lol

I'm only leaving this house for little island ice cream. Which I'll probably buy tomorrow after work.
So I'm not leaving this house
@RUOKAnny this sounds awesome!
Going after an opportunity at the last minute is sorta my thing
Like everyone else in Wellington who gets a public holiday tomorrow, I'm still wide awake
The wind is on another damn level and at least one of my friends plane's has managed to land in this weather. Amazing
All day yesterday, I was thinking that crowd size isn't a big deal and comparisons are meaningless. But looks like… https://t.co/N9UdfcupGN
Brunch so epic that I now have to take a nap
I regret making plans to leave my bed on this cold rainy morning.
I'm really fucking sick of white guys on the internet who want to 'debate', but only with women or minorities. You people are a scourge
Those people wanna say terrible things, but don't wanna deal with the backlash. You can't just choose one. Own your goddamn consequences
The responses to this tweet are another example of minorities being expected to take the high road when confronted… https://t.co/AqngOzPwdI
There's a certain level of ignorance that I just never deal with. So when it enters my life I'm like "WTF, how are you even here?? U lost??"
@StephMatukuWaV straight up, that look came at me from all angles. Honestly thought one of the Aunty's was gonna throw a shoe at me
Donald Glover is America's best Donald. https://t.co/xQww2Or34R
Wow, just discovered a great way to make middle-aged brown people angry at me - ask them who Peabo Bryson is.
The Idris post that got shared made me sick & angry. Glad there was a call out by someone more eloquent than me https://t.co/pK7ajlA6iz
@ezbear ahahaha oh man!!! I really wish he could've accepted that (and I could've gone with)
Trump is President. I don't think my tolerance or opinion of white men will ever be lower than it is today.
Asshole #CNN employee denied permission to use video of a brave attendant after trying to get her in trouble… https://t.co/7UVB0sQYV5
Inauguration is in about 7 hours. I'm logging off social media until this is over. Good luck everyone!
Thread. What a rant! https://t.co/GtAkX8nB5q
STOP GIVING JIMI JACKSON PUBLICITY. FOR FUCKS SAKE
The actual term was a "PC bubble" and like lololol!! We're just trying to promote equality for all, but check your disdain for equality 🙃🙃
